Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a grey-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially black in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of five lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394415) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394415)
